name: Qwikswitchsmarthome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Lounge”
”Alexa, turn off Lounge”
”Alexa, set Lounge to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control connected Qwikswitch devices with your voice.
You will require a Qwikswitch hub and wireless Qwikswitch unit as well as a Qwikswitch account.

Go to http://qwikswitch.co.za/ to get started
